fields.Title: SEAFORT / DESERTER REASONING
fields.Description:
Why did he do it and how it happened.

REACTION (MOT) red check

fields.Title: Suggestion: "And now he longs to see her covered..."
fields.Dialogue Text: And now he longs to see her covered in blood.

fields.Title: You: ""Are you sure? I checked the submer..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Are you sure? I checked the submersible. There was nothing there."
fields.Alternate1: "Are you sure? We checked the submersible. There was nothing there."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""It didn't say *Klaasje* in there....."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It didn't say *Klaasje* in there..." He shakes his head.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "You lost it..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You lost it...

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "There! He's already admitted to it!..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There! He's already admitted to it! Just ask...

fields.Title: The Deserter: "He nods. "Made a little love-nest u..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He nods. "Made a little love-nest up there. Sweaty linen and bottles they would use for god knows what... I saw other men there too, but I can't be sure. Even a woman once."

fields.Title: Shivers: "Inside, in a cell, a young woman is..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Inside, in a cell, a young woman is withdrawing from amphetamines, barbiturates and alcohol. All at once. While two men in brown suits wave ICP badges at a young policeman. She hears the door open...

fields.Title: Shivers: "On the platform a young woman is wi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: On the platform a young woman is withdrawing from amphetamines, barbiturates and alcohol. Yet still she smiles among the crowd, fading from your mind's eye...

fields.Title: You: ""Rich hag?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Rich hag?"

fields.Title: Half Light: "An anger too, in addition to loneli..."
fields.Dialogue Text: An anger too, in addition to loneliness.

fields.Title: You: ""You climbed, right? You *climbed*..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You climbed, right? You *climbed* behind her window, like the CRAB-MAN?"

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Like that too, yes," he nods. "Ben..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Like that too, yes," he nods. "Bending like a bow against the glass..."

fields.Title: You: ""Why then?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why then?"

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "He must have... climbed to the roof..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He must have... climbed to the roof maybe?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "... then at the man. "How did you g..."
fields.Dialogue Text: ... then at the man. "How did you get in there? The hidden pinball workshop?"

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "Of course it's not *okay*. Make up..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Of course it's not *okay*. Make up for it now, maximum performance!

fields.Title: You: ""She got away. I don't know where s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "She got away. I don't know where she is."
fields.Alternate1: "She got away. We don't know where she is."

fields.Title: You: ""She got away, but she led me here..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "She got away, but she led me here first. She figured out someone was watching her from the seafort."
fields.Alternate1: "She got away, but she led us here first. She figured out someone was watching her from the seafort."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""It was about bitches." The boy nod..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It was about bitches." The boy nods grimly.

fields.Title: Shivers: "...and knows it's over. They've com..."
fields.Dialogue Text: ...and knows it's over. They've come for her. Outside it's springtime, the river  flows blue and green into the Bay of Martinaise.

fields.Title: Shivers: "Midtown, across the bay of Revachol..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Midtown, across the bay of Revachol. Cold rain falls on forty-story towers. Above them -- Lausanne Central Aerodrome; a cocoon suspended in the grey sky by a web of suspension wiring, encircled by hybrid aircraft.

fields.Title: You: ""This is the so-called soucriant ag..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This is the so-called soucriant again, right? Joyce?"

fields.Title: You: ""Got it.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Got it."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""How could you see what she looked..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How could you see what she looked like? You said it was dark."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Sloppy, we should have gotten her..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sloppy, we should have gotten her to tell us about this..." the lieutenant mutters to himself. "Did you take the documents?"

fields.Title: You: "How does he know those minute detai..."
fields.Dialogue Text: How does he know those minute details about her body?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You could tell she was a *spook* f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You could tell she was a *spook* from the documents?"

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""There's..." he sighs, "there's not..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There's..." he sighs, "there's nothing to hold on to, only this... It's not enough."

fields.Title: You: ""When was this?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "When was this?"

fields.Title: You: ""Did you leave the dried May bells..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Did you leave the dried May bells behind her window?"

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "The bruises. Can you make that out..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The bruises. Can you make that out in a scope?

fields.Title: You: ""How did you see all this. The brui..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How did you see all this. The bruises; that she was beaten?"

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""That kind of thing is fine by the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That kind of thing is fine by the Party so it's fine by me. But it goes to show you..." He just shakes his head.

fields.Title: You: "Look east..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Look east...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We could get more..." the lieutena..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We could get more..." the lieutenant uses the opportunity to tell you -- in a lowered voice. "We've got him talking..."

fields.Title: You: "Look north..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Look north...

fields.Title: Shivers: "Midtown, across the bay of Revachol..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Midtown, across the bay of Revachol. Snow falls on forty-story towers. Above them -- Lausanne Central Aerodrome; a cocoon suspended in the snowy sky by a web of suspension wiring, encircled by hybrid aircraft.

fields.Title: Empathy: "Good luck, Harry, she thinks. You n..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Good luck, Harry, she thinks. You need something *good* for this...

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Some strange glandular process take..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Some strange glandular process takes place in him at the thought. Like yeast rising...

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Joyce... he means Joyce again."
fields.Dialogue Text: Joyce... he means Joyce again.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""They moved into a deserted apartme..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They moved into a deserted apartment above the roundabout." He nods toward the city. "Radio equipment out for all to see -- reactionary radio playing. Sloppy and drunk."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Hiding something in the water. She..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hiding something in the water. She had a fag after she'd done it. I was up in the ruins there -- she couldn't see me, but I could see her. Smoking... she was nervous, but not scared."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Why would I need that trash?" He l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why would I need that trash?" He looks to the reeds, confused. "I'm not going to Villiers..."

fields.Title: You: ""Did you take the documents?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Did you take the documents?"

fields.Title: You: ""First -- you could tell she was a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "First -- you could tell she was a *spook* from the documents?"

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""She practically breastfed that man..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "She practically breastfed that man. You wouldn't believe the things she let him do to her..." He shakes his head and stares at the ashes.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""You turn it on inside and it gets..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You turn it on inside and it gets so dark out you can't see a man looking in. I learned that in the Twenties when they were still hunting me. I've seen people do *some* shit, but..." He keeps shaking his head.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""I can just walk in the hostel now,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I can just walk in the hostel now, after a good wash. They all think I'm an antisocial, a vagrant. Closing hour is a good time. The kitchen's empty then."

fields.Title: You: ""One more thing, Mr. Dros -- the dr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "One more thing, Mr. Dros -- the dried flowers. On the roof."

fields.Title: You: ""How did you see all this. The brui..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How did you see all this. The bruises, that she was beaten?"

fields.Title: You: ""I'm not like that. I don't think l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm not like that. I don't think like that."

fields.Title: You: ""I hate women too, you know.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I hate women too, you know."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""You're delusional. There's nothing..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're delusional. There's nothing to *see* in the soul of the bourgeois woman. It's the same as the surface -- sick hedonism and desperation."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Where is she?" The old man looks a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Where is she?" The old man looks at you. "I haven't seen her there for days."
fields.Alternate1: "Where is she... that *Klaasje*?" The old man looks at you. "I haven't seen her there for days."

fields.Title: Logic: "Who knows what he's seen and done o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Who knows what he's seen and done over the years?

fields.Title: The Deserter: "The old man has fallen silent, star..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The old man has fallen silent, staring at your feet. The burnt logs in the fire are moist from the sea air.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Did you keep the documents in it?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Did you keep the documents in it?"

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Yeah." Cuno nods knowingly. "The l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah." Cuno nods knowingly. "The lightning gets shit going. Speedfreaks fuckin' in the bushes..."

fields.Title: You: ""Ever see her through a window, on..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ever see her through a window, on a roof?"

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Seems like the answer was yes."
fields.Dialogue Text: Seems like the answer was yes.

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "The calibre of bullet he used does..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The calibre of bullet he used does not do that kind of damage.

fields.Title: You: ""So you were jealous?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "So you were jealous?"

fields.Title: You: ""What do you think she hid there?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What do you think she hid there?"

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""That too," he nods."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That too," he nods.

fields.Title: You: ""You've been through the secret rou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You've been through the secret route behind the Whirling-in-Rags." (Move on.)
fields.Alternate1: "You've been through the secret route behind the Whirling-in-Rags. Those were *your* footprints. You just changed your shoes." (Move on.)
fields.Alternate2: "You've been through the secret route behind the Whirling-in-Rags. Those were *your* footprints." (Move on.)

fields.Title: The Deserter: "Neither does he. He lowers his head..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Neither does he. He lowers his head, like a sunflower on a withered stalk.

fields.Title: You: ""There have been others?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "There have been others?"

fields.Title: Volition: "It's as if something *put* the thou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's as if something *put* the thought there. To leave the flowers.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Maybe..." He lowers his head and j..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Maybe..." He lowers his head and just stares at the logs. "I have these... holes in my brain now. I wouldn't just sit here waiting for you..."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""I did. I shouldn't have. It was a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I did. I shouldn't have. It was a mistake..." A tremor passes the right side of his face.

fields.Title: You: ""Men are insane." (Shake your head...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Men are insane." (Shake your head.)

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "See you tomorrow, Harry. Her voice..."
fields.Dialogue Text: See you tomorrow, Harry. Her voice rings in the evening air, burning...

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "As the men go, Patrol Officer Minot..."
fields.Dialogue Text: As the men go, Patrol Officer Minot looks back over her shoulder -- at the crumbling fortification in the snowfall, like a rotten tooth rising out of the water...

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "*Enough*. Take him in. Bend his arm..."
fields.Dialogue Text: *Enough*. Take him in. Bend his arms behind his back and end this.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""I could see they've returned now...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I could see they've returned now. To show their real face -- the face they don't dare show their bourgeois voters back on Mundi, with their families and polyester clothes..."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""So don't you sermonize me, you rac..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So don't you sermonize me, you racist shithole." He adds. "It's still bourgeois when the bourgeois does it. Fiddling with their sexual organs..."

fields.Title: You: ""Did you have feelings for that wom..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Did you have feelings for that woman?"

fields.Title: Composure: "A strange confusion comes over him..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A strange confusion comes over him from time to time. Some kind of aberration of the nervous system?

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""She had different colour hair on t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "She had different colour hair on the photo, and glasses. *Forged*. Some sordid, bourgeois affair. I've heard about this kind of thing on the radio..."

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "One more loose end down. We're doin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: One more loose end down. We're doing this, detective.

fields.Title: Empathy: "On her."
fields.Dialogue Text: On her.

fields.Title: Half Light: "A strange, uncalled for rage he see..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A strange, uncalled for rage he seems to have no control over.

fields.Title: You: ""Nothing.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nothing."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "In the silence, the lieutenant draw..."
fields.Dialogue Text: In the silence, the lieutenant draws a line in his notes. Then nods at you once more.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Heh..." He shakes his silver-grey..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Heh..." He shakes his silver-grey head.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Gone..." He looks to the city and..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Gone..." He looks to the city and nods: "I knew it. She kept staring into the scope this last week. At the island, like she knew...." He sighs.

fields.Title: You: ""Why did you?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why did you?"

fields.Title: Shivers: "Across the harbour, on the South ba..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Across the harbour, on the South bank of the River Esperance, white snow falls on a two story box of duraluminum. Precinct 57, near the gates to Terminal H.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""I've been through *all* of Martina..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I've been through *all* of Martinaise -- every nook and cranny."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Wrinkled up whore," he nods."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wrinkled up whore," he nods.

fields.Title: Logic: "That must be the representative of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That must be the representative of the Harbour company, who came in on her boat.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""I've seen their kind during the La..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I've seen their kind during the Landing. Those Occidental and Mesque falangues weren't conscripts -- boys, like us. They were wights. All they know is to destroy and hurt."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Past the Feld building, on the coa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Past the Feld building, on the coast? What was she doing there?"

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""No. Why would I do that? I didn't..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No. Why would I do that? I didn't need tickets to Villiers... I put them back. If I wanted to extort someone I'd do better."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""I could see who she was, too," he..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I could see who she was, too," he nods. "A spook. On the run. Revachol's the cloaca of capital now. All the bagmen and arms dealers end up here. To do drugs and have sex like animals."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "You hear the familiar scribble of t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You hear the familiar scribble of the lieutenant's pen. A quick glance at you...

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "You're a bad detective. Lazy and ba..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You're a bad detective. Lazy and bad.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""What do you mean *put*?" He raises..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What do you mean *put*?" He raises his eyes. They're round and wide.

fields.Title: Composure: "And inexplicably. It doesn't go wit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: And inexplicably. It doesn't go with his pained voice.

fields.Title: You: ""A red haired woman? Ruby...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "A red haired woman? Ruby..."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Good for her..." He looks to the c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good for her..." He looks to the city and nods: "That girl kept staring into the scope, you know -- in the end. This last week, kept staring at the island..."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Locked up with your masters, like..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Locked up with your masters, like I'll be... maybe we'll meet?" He looks to the city. "She kept staring into the scope, you know -- in the end. Like she *knew*."

fields.Title: Perception (Hearing): "You hear a low frequency hiss, bare..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You hear a low frequency hiss, barely. Beneath the audible spectrum. Then it's gone.

fields.Title: Shivers: "...and knows it's over. They've com..."
fields.Dialogue Text: ...and knows it's over. They've come for her. Outside night falls, the river flows by, treacle black into the Bay of Martinaise.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "As the men go, Patrol Officer Minot..."
fields.Dialogue Text: As the men go, Patrol Officer Minot looks back over her shoulder -- at the crumbling fortification in the rain, like a rotten tooth rising out of the water...

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Wrinkled up whore," he nods."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wrinkled up whore," he nods.

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Yeah, but that one too, right? Sec..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, but that one too, right? Secret Whirling shit?"

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "Thank god, the lieutenant is pickin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Thank god, the lieutenant is picking it up...

fields.Title: You: ""Khm..." (Cough.) "Moving on -- the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Khm..." (Cough.) "Moving on -- the victim arrives some time after her..."
fields.Alternate1: "Khm..." (Cough.) "Moving on -- the negotiator's *security detail* arrives shortly after..."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""And I wanted her to see his head e..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And I wanted her to see his head explode," he nods. "That too. She should know better than to hold a child murderer between her thighs. I knew he'd be there for one more second, *writhing*..."

fields.Title: You: ""You wanted to punish her, so you k..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You wanted to punish her, so you killed him."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""In the water, behind the camp site..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "In the water, behind the camp site there," he waves erratically toward the coast. "I don't remember precisely. It was in the winter. It was cold out..."

fields.Title: You: ""Did you keep the materials? When I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Did you keep the materials? When I found the submersible it was empty."

fields.Title: Logic: "A little inconsistency -- he was su..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A little inconsistency -- he was surprised to hear her name Klaasje, before. Would he not have seen it on the documents?

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""I can just walk in there now, afte..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I can just walk in there now, after a good wash -- I told you they think I'm an antisocial. Closing hour is a good time. The kitchen's empty."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""I got that open a long time ago. S..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I got that open a long time ago. Some bourgeois game-merchant lived there -- I don't know... fifteen years ago? He left spare keys all over and I took one. Then I saw her turn the light on one night in my scope..." He points toward the Whirling-in-Rags.

fields.Title: Interfacing: "And he found use for it -- a spare..."
fields.Dialogue Text: And he found use for it -- a spare key, like the one hanging behind the Union box window.

fields.Title: You: ""And the door? The steel door in th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And the door? The steel door in the kitchen, how do you open that?"

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "He must knows his way around a crea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He must knows his way around a creaky floorboard and a rusty hinge on a door...

fields.Title: You: ""How did you get close enough to se..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How did you get close enough to see her bruises, Mr. Dros?"

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""What are you talking about -- 'cra..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What are you talking about -- 'crab-man'?" He waves you off with a cough.

fields.Title: Logic: "No it's not. Fix this now! Move on..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No it's not. Fix this now! Move on extra carefully! Be incredibly *minute*!

fields.Title: You: ""I just got this feeling. From what..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I just got this feeling. From what you said. Do you agree?"

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""If you came ten years ago, I would..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If you came ten years ago, I would have killed you." He wipes his eye.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""*Twisted* by psychopharmaceuticals..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Twisted* by psychopharmaceuticals, alcohol, and the class interests of the bourgeoisie. They all are -- women nowadays..." He raises his eyes from the ashes.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Her..." He repeats, staring at the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Her..." He repeats, staring at the ashes -- then at the reeds. There's a twitch in the corner of his eye.

fields.Title: Perception (Hearing): "You hear a low frequency hiss, bare..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You hear a low frequency hiss, barely beneath the audible spectrum. Then it's gone.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "Special consultant  Heidelstam is o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Special consultant  Heidelstam is optimistic: "We'll see the boat when he comes. Let's go get a coffee until then. I know this interesting little place, where..." His voice trails off as the three walk down the jetty.

fields.Title: Cuno: ""You've been through some secret ro..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You've been through some secret route shit, huh? *Inside* the Whirling-in-Rags, creepin' around?"

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Yes, that too." He shakes his head..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, that too." He shakes his head, almost in awe. "The things they did in that little room. What she'd *do* to feel good..." He explains: "Funny, the way light works..."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Since she came to Martinaise. I sa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Since she came to Martinaise. I saw her sneaking in the reeds early in the morning, behind the Feld building. It was dark, still winter. She didn't have her skimpy outfit on then, just a spot in the night, moving..."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""I have my ways." A cracked smile a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I have my ways." A cracked smile appears on his dried white lips.

fields.Title: You: ""Another question about her.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Another question about her."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Staring at the island, the fort, l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Staring at the island, the fort, like she knew I was here..." He adds, to no one in particular: "It doesn't matter."

fields.Title: Shivers: "Good bye, Martinaise."
fields.Dialogue Text: Good bye, Martinaise.

fields.Title: Suggestion: "You could get more out of him... He..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You could get more out of him... He likes talking.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Oh yes," he smacks his lips. "Cutt..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh yes," he smacks his lips. "Cutting those drugs of hers into little lines with a knife, masturbating..."

fields.Title: You: ""And that too.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "And that too."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "He knew she knows. She was looking..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He knew she knows. She was looking at the island, figuring it out -- day by day, cigarette by cigarette...

fields.Title: You: ""Let's talk about something else fo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's talk about something else for now."

fields.Title: You: ""Wights?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wights?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Did you keep what was in it? When..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Did you keep what was in it? When we found the submersible it was empty."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""No. I put them back. Why would I t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No. I put them back. Why would I take them, I'm not going to Falne..." He seems confused, momentarily. "Or... I mean..."

fields.Title: You: ""What did it say her name was -- in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What did it say her name was -- in the passport?"

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "It quickly comes to you."
fields.Dialogue Text: It quickly comes to you.
fields.Alternate1: The secret path. He could have just *changed* his shoes, the prints in the dust were his!

fields.Title: Logic: "This one's *gone*. Make up somehow,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This one's *gone*. Make up somehow, connect something else, fast!

fields.Title: You: ""And you brought her May bells?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "And you brought her May bells?"

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Yes. Over the years. It's not un-p..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. Over the years. It's not un-proletarian to feel something."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "In the silence, the lieutenant draw..."
fields.Dialogue Text: In the silence, the lieutenant draws a line in his notes.

fields.Title: You: ""I am not at liberty to say.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I am not at liberty to say."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant nods at you, in ackn..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant nods at you, in acknowledgement.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "That's it. Motive. We have it."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's it. Motive. We have it.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "There, on a dilapidated jetty in a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There, on a dilapidated jetty in a nameless village, two police officers and one special consultant look across a narrow strip of sea. The ruins of a seafort stick out of the water, built by Filippe II, re-appropriated by the Commune, then lost in the Landing...

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: ""He's there, doing... *what* exactl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "He's there, doing... *what* exactly I don't know," Satellite-Officer Vicquemare points at the ruins. "Behind that anti-aircraft-something. That's why we can't see him."

fields.Title: Shivers: "...and knows it's over. They've com..."
fields.Dialogue Text: ...and knows it's over. They've come for her. Outside the dusk gathers, the river  flows by, gold and orange into the Bay of Martinaise.

fields.Title: You: ""Whore. Good strong word. I use it..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Whore. Good strong word. I use it often myself."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Lax sexual morals are a bourgeois..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Lax sexual morals are a bourgeois ploy," he gargles a spit ball. "As to pederasty, the Party legalized it in '04. My Party, not your liberal masters." He spits it out on the dying coals.

fields.Title: Jump to: [The Deserter: ""Wrinkled up whore," he nods."]
Empathy: "While he stands here and rots."
fields.Dialogue Text: While he stands here and rots.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Three weeks ago, when the rich hag..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Three weeks ago, when the rich hag came in on her galley. Her honour guard came in tow."

fields.Title: You: ""And by that you mean the represent..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And by that you mean the representative of the harbour company?"

fields.Title: You: ""How long had you been watching her?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "How long had you been watching her?"

fields.Title: You: ""Where was this submersible, looks..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Where was this submersible, looks like the investigation missed it?"

fields.Title: Drama: "He's setting it up for you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's setting it up for you...

fields.Title: You: ""How did you get *in* there? The hi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How did you get *in* there? The hidden pinball workshop?"

fields.Title: You: ""How did you get close enough to se..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How did you get close enough to see the bruises, Mr. Dros?"

fields.Title: You: ""One more thing about this woman...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "One more thing about this woman..."

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "The coals of his eyes glisten sudde..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The coals of his eyes glisten suddenly, like stones dripping with water. Is he crying?

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "This implies that he's thought abou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This implies that he's thought about extorting her.

fields.Title: Logic: "Also, a little inconsistency here -..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Also, a little inconsistency here -- he was surprised to hear her name Klaasje, before. Would he not have seen it on the documents?

fields.Title: You: ""She did deserve a good punishing.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "She did deserve a good punishing."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""True, there is something bourgeois..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "True, there is something bourgeois about women..." He nods. "The weak are more vulnerable to exploitation by capital, unless they rise up in arms, which the likes of her..." He shakes his head.

fields.Title: You: "This has got nothing to do with tha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This has got nothing to do with that. (Try to forget it.)

fields.Title: Jump to: [The Deserter: "The old man raises his gaze. Someth..."]
Esprit de Corps: "As the men go, Patrol Officer Minot..."
fields.Dialogue Text: As the men go, Patrol Officer Minot looks back over her shoulder -- at the crumbling fortification, like a rotten tooth rising out of the water...

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""I've been through *all* of Martina..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I've been through *all* of Martinaise -- every nook and cranny."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""That's all it takes for the bullet..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's all it takes for the bullet to reach his head." He squints. "Now that I think of it, I wasn't aiming for his mouth. I wanted his brains to spill out on her... but..." he shrugs, "you can't have everything."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Jealousy is a reactionary concept...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Jealousy is a reactionary concept. I didn't *like* the reaver enjoying himself -- drugged out, soothed in the arms of a young woman. I wanted him to die so he could not enjoy life anymore."

fields.Title: Volition: "This man has seen past her, like yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This man has seen past her, like you did.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "And beautiful."
fields.Dialogue Text: And beautiful.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""I've seen her like that, yes," he..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I've seen her like that, yes," he nods. "Cutting those drugs of hers into little lines with a knife, masturbating..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You had to open the steel door in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You had to open the steel door in the kitchen? How?"

fields.Title: You: ""You climbed, right? You *climbed*..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You climbed, right? You *climbed* behind her window?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You've been through the secret rou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You've been through the secret route behind the Whirling-in-Rags." The lieutenant interrupts.
fields.Alternate1: "You've been through the secret route behind the Whirling-in-Rags." The lieutenant steps in: "Those were *your* footprints. You just changed your shoes."
fields.Alternate2: "You've been through the secret route behind the Whirling-in-Rags." The lieutenant steps in: "Those were *your* footprints."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Her..." he repeats, with strange s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Her..." he repeats, with strange slowness.

fields.Title: Pain Threshold: "A little pain there. A prick."
fields.Dialogue Text: A little pain there. A prick.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "It's no good, Harry. Her voice ring..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's no good, Harry. Her voice rings in the evening air. It smells of burning buildings...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""A red haired woman? Ruby...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "A red haired woman? Ruby..."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""The world is insane..." He raises..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The world is insane..." He raises his gaze. Something glimmers in there. Then it's gone.

fields.Title: Empathy: "A bitter taste on his tongue."
fields.Dialogue Text: A bitter taste on his tongue.

fields.Title: You: ""You saw through her? So did I.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You saw through her? So did I."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""She'd look -- at night, crying or..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "She'd look -- at night, crying or smoking on the roof -- staring right into me..." He adds, to no one in particular: "It doesn't matter."

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "Across the water, on a dilapidated..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Across the water, on a dilapidated jetty in a nameless village -- made of grey cinder block houses with eternite roofs -- two police officers and one special consultant look across a narrow strip of sea.

fields.Title: You: ""What is it with these *whores* and..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What is it with these *whores* and *pederasts*... aren't you a communist?"

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""She had different colour hair on t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "She had different colour hair on the photo -- and glasses. *Forged*. Some sort of sordid, bourgeois affair. I've heard about this kind of thing on the radio..."

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "Thank god, the kid is picking it up..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Thank god, the kid is picking it up...

fields.Title: You: ""And the bruises -- you could see h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And the bruises -- you could see her bruises through the scope of a rifle?"

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Everything in him fills with imposs..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Everything in him fills with impossible longing, all at once.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Did you make that hole?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Did you make that hole?"

fields.Title: You: ""What *ways*? Tell me!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What *ways*? Tell me!"

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Not in this lifetime droite." He w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Not in this lifetime droite." He waves you off with a cough, his thoughts elsewhere...

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""I've been through *all* of Martina..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I've been through *all* of Martinaise -- every nook and cranny."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Dive for other clues now, like you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Dive for other clues now, like you always do. Make it up in the deep end...

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Maybe..." He lowers his head and j..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Maybe..." He lowers his head and just stares at the logs. "I told you, I have holes in my brain now. I wouldn't just sit here waiting for you..."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "You stare at them too. In your mind..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You stare at them too. In your mind, Her Innocence Dei still turns to leave, airport bag in hand, silks flowing in her wake...

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "There -- motive, detective. We have..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There -- motive, detective. We have it.

fields.Title: You: "Shake it off."
fields.Dialogue Text: Shake it off.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Like she *knew* I was here..." He..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Like she *knew* I was here..." He adds, to no one in particular: "It doesn't matter."

fields.Title: Shivers: "Across the harbour, on the South ba..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Across the harbour, on the South bank of the River Esperance, the air stands still outside Precinct 57 -- a two story box of duraluminum near the gates to Terminal H.

fields.Title: Shivers: "On the platform a young woman is wi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: On the platform a young woman is withdrawing from amphetamines, barbiturates and alcohol. Yet still she smiles among the crowd, among the great ghost of the city she's leaving -- for another, far south.

fields.Title: Shivers: "Smaller. Distant. Hidden. Not like..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Smaller. Distant. Hidden. Not like the great chandelier she sees sparkle in the spring air below her. Streets and towers, tenements and water -- and across it, a dark strip of ruins barely visible, if she didn't squint her eyes...

fields.Title: You: ""Did you keep the materials?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Did you keep the materials?"

fields.Title: You: ""You've been through the secret rou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You've been through the secret route behind the Whirling-in-Rags." (Move on.)
fields.Alternate1: "You've been through the secret route behind the Whirling-in-Rags. Those were *your* footprints there. You just changed your shoes." (Move on.)
fields.Alternate2: "You've been through the secret route behind the Whirling-in-Rags. Those were *your* footprints in the dust." (Move on.)

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""I don't really know. I was there o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't really know. I was there one night and she was crying, like a child -- in the corner of her room, on the floor. Like she does sometimes...."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""It was something else..." He stutt..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It was something else..." He stutters. "I don't remember. It was dark that morning. I only remember her face on the photo."
fields.Alternate1: "It was something..." He stutters. "I don't remember. It was dark that morning. I only remember her face on the photo."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "In the Free State of Semenine. Hidd..."
fields.Dialogue Text: In the Free State of Semenine. Hidden away at the edge of the Earth, near the pale.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""What about them?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What about them?"

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""With a clip point knife.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "With a clip point knife."

fields.Title: Perception (Hearing): "Good for listening in too. For hear..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Good for listening in too. For hearing the moaning and the snorts.

fields.Title: You: "One little thing missed and I drown..."
fields.Dialogue Text: One little thing missed and I drown in anxiety...

fields.Title: You: "No. It's cool. I've already got him..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No. It's cool. I've already got him. I don't need to be perfect.

fields.Title: You: ""Something *put* the thought in you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Something *put* the thought in you. A compulsion."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""No..." He starts to shake his head..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No..." He starts to shake his head again, a sunflower on a withered stalk.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""The day after I'd killed him.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "The day after I'd killed him."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""You can't see bruises through a sc..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You can't see bruises through a scope. It's just a blur..." He shakes his silver-grey head.

fields.Title: You: ""I arrested her.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I arrested her."

fields.Title: Shivers: "Inside, in a cell, a young woman is..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Inside, in a cell, a young woman is withdrawing from amphetamines, barbiturates and alcohol. Shivering, she fades from your mind's eye...

fields.Title: Shivers: "Smaller. Distant. Hidden. Not like..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Smaller. Distant. Hidden. Not like the great chandelier she sees sparkle in the night below her. Street lights, towers, tenements and water -- and across it, a dark strip of ruins barely visible, if she didn't squint her eyes...

fields.Title: You: ""You mean the Wild Pines representa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You mean the Wild Pines representative again, right?"

fields.Title: You: ""The bruises on her body -- any cha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The bruises on her body -- any chance you've seen them through a *hole in a wall?*"

fields.Title: You: ""Let's talk about something else fo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's talk about something else for now."

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "For him to stop reacting to stimuli..."
fields.Dialogue Text: For him to stop reacting to stimuli, to be broken off from the world. Cordoned into darkness.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Her body sweating from the drugs, s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Her body sweating from the drugs, slick from cerebral haemorrhage.

fields.Title: You: ""This is the hidden buoy she told u..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This is the hidden buoy she told us about... You looked into it?"

fields.Title: You: ""You saw her name on the passport...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You saw her name on the passport. But before, when I said her name is *Klaasje* -- you didn't seem to recognize it."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Mhm," he smacks his lips. "Bending..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Mhm," he smacks his lips. "Bending like a bow against the glass..."

fields.Title: You: ""You made that hole?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You made that hole?"

fields.Title: You: "Say nothing."
fields.Dialogue Text: Say nothing.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Man needs to feel something else...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Man needs to feel something else. In this fight, it helps if you have your eye on something there," he looks to the city. "It's weakness, I know."
fields.Alternate1: "Man needs to feel something else. It helps if you have your eye on something -- there," he looks to the city where the lights sparkle. "Something pretty. It's weakness, I know."

fields.Title: You: ""And you could see her bruises -- t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And you could see her bruises -- through the scope of a rifle?"

fields.Title: Drama: "Safe and sound, sire. Surely you ha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Safe and sound, sire. Surely you have not misplaced the witness.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""At night, crying or smoking on the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "At night, crying or smoking on the roof. Like she knew I was here..." He says to no one in particular: "It doesn't matter."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Herding the strikebreakers like th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Herding the strikebreakers like that -- I kept an eye on them." He stares inland, then back at you.

fields.Title: You: ""By that you mean Joyce Messier, th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "By that you mean Joyce Messier, the Wild Pines rep?"

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Them fucking..." He looks at the c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Them fucking..." He looks at the charred wood. "I didn't like that."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""After she was gone." He nods."
fields.Dialogue Text: "After she was gone." He nods.

fields.Title: Composure: "There it is again. The strange neur..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There it is again. The strange neurological state he's sometimes in.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Yes. After she'd gone. It was a su..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. After she'd gone. It was a submersible. Well made, actually..."

fields.Title: You: "Shake it off."
fields.Dialogue Text: Shake it off.

fields.Title: You: ""Okay then.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay then."

fields.Title: Authority: "To punish her."
fields.Dialogue Text: To punish her.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""I did." He almost smiles. "She had..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I did." He almost smiles. "She had a face like an archipelago, with those birthmarks. And a body, hard and lean and bruised all over -- black and yellow. I could see she's taken a beating."

fields.Title: You: ""One more thing about her...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "One more thing about her..."

fields.Title: Empathy: "A brief flash of terror."
fields.Dialogue Text: A brief flash of terror.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""No one gives a *shit* what you thi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No one gives a *shit* what you think," the old man spits in the ash. "You and your cronies kill ten working class men a day. I've heard the statistics on Channel 8."

fields.Title: You: ""I arrested her." (Lie.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: "I arrested her." (Lie.)

fields.Title: Shivers: "Smaller. Distant. Hidden. Not like..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Smaller. Distant. Hidden. Not like the great chandelier she sees sparkle in the dusk below her. Streets, towers, tenements and cold water; and across the water -- a dark strip of ruins barely visible, if she didn't squint her eyes...

fields.Title: The Deserter: "He draws shallow breaths."
fields.Dialogue Text: He draws shallow breaths.

fields.Title: The Deserter: "He draws shallow breaths."
fields.Dialogue Text: He draws shallow breaths.

fields.Title: The Deserter: "*Splat*, a bloody spitball lands on..."
fields.Dialogue Text: *Splat*, a bloody spitball lands on the firewood.

fields.Title: Suggestion: "He wants to see her covered in bloo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He wants to see her covered in blood.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Her..." He repeats, staring at the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Her..." He repeats, staring at the ashes -- then the reeds. There's a twitch in the corner of his eye.

fields.Title: You: ""What was she doing there?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What was she doing there?"

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""The sun came up, her hair was like..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The sun came up, her hair was like cobwebs. She smoked more fags and snorted a line of whatever shit she was on. Right there..." he shakes his head. "She needed it just to move."

fields.Title: Logic: "Rightly so. Fix this now! Push on,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Rightly so. Fix this now! Push on, extra carefully!

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Is it? You don't feel like it is. Y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Is it? You don't feel like it is. You feel like you should make up for it by *scrutinizing* him extra carefully...

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""That fucking whore..." He waves hi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That fucking whore..." He waves his hand, with sudden anger. Something comes over him...

fields.Title: Half Light: "A sudden pang of rage."
fields.Dialogue Text: A sudden pang of rage.

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "Wait, she was a *spook*? How did he..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wait, she was a *spook*? How did he come to that?

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""That kind of thing is fine by the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That kind of thing is fine by the Party so it's fine by me, but it goes to show you..." He just shakes his head.

fields.Title: You: "Let it be."
fields.Dialogue Text: Let it be.

fields.Title: Shivers: "Midtown, across the bay of Revachol..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Midtown, across the bay of Revachol. The oceanic wind washes forty-story towers. Above them -- Lausanne Central Aerodrome; a cocoon suspended in the sky by a web of suspension wiring, encircled by hybrid aircraft.

fields.Title: The Deserter: "The old man falls silent. Staring a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The old man falls silent. Staring at your feet, the burnt logs.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Those two took the cake."
fields.Dialogue Text: Those two took the cake.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Joyce... he means Joyce."
fields.Dialogue Text: Joyce... he means Joyce.

fields.Title: You: ""So in conclusion, it wasn't about..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So in conclusion, it wasn't about him. It was about *her*." (Conclude.)

fields.Title: You: ""And beautiful.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "And beautiful."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Her passport. And tickets to Villi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Her passport. And tickets to Villiers." He coughs. "And from there to Casherbrume."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""You can't see that through a scope..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You can't see that through a scope. It's just a blur there..." He shakes his silver-grey head.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""One more thing -- the flowers, Mr...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "One more thing -- the flowers, Mr. Dros. The dried flowers that were on the roof."

fields.Title: You: ""How good are those fucking eyes of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How good are those fucking eyes of yours -- you use binoculars?"

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "As you should be, son, this is piti..."
fields.Dialogue Text: As you should be, son, this is pitiful. Make up for it now!

fields.Title: You: ""Was that why you left the dried fl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Was that why you left the dried flowers behind her window?"

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""I don't understand..." He shakes h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't understand..." He shakes his head.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "One more down."
fields.Dialogue Text: One more down.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "The bruises. You can't make that ou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The bruises. You can't make that out in a scope...

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""I'm not blind, am I?" He shakes hi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm not blind, am I?" He shakes his silver head.

fields.Title: You: "Say nothing."
fields.Dialogue Text: Say nothing.

fields.Title: The Deserter: "The old man raises his gaze. Someth..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The old man raises his gaze. Something glimmers in the corner of his black eye...

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""I know she's gone." He looks to th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I know she's gone." He looks to the city. "Locked up, or on the run.... She kept staring into the scope, you know. In the end, this last week. At the fort. Like she *knew*."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""I was there one night and she was..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I was there one night and she was crying. Like a child, in the corner of her room -- on the floor. I'd never seen her do that before."

fields.Title: Shivers: "Across the harbour, on the banks of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Across the harbour, on the banks of the River Esperance, cold rain falls on Precinct 57 -- a two story box of duraluminum near the gates to Terminal H.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Barely alive. They like to kill wh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Barely alive. They like to kill while they're on their drugs. After the landing, in the burning years I would take shots at them, *end* them. The worst ones. If I had a bullet to spare."

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "One little thing -- what was her *n..."
fields.Dialogue Text: One little thing -- what was her *name*, on the passport. Just curious...

fields.Title: You: ""Some kind of hidden container on t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Some kind of hidden container on the coast? You looked into it?

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""The sun came up and her hair was l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The sun came up and her hair was like cobwebs. She smoked more fags and snorted a line of whatever *shit* she was on. Right there..." he shakes his head. "She needed it just to move."

fields.Title: You: ""Moving on -- did you continue watc..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Moving on -- did you continue watching her after this?" (Proceed.)

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But *that* nook too?" The lieutena..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But *that* nook too?" The lieutenant does not let you finish.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Yes," he looks at the charred logs..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes," he looks at the charred logs. "I don't know why I do the things I do anymore."

fields.Title: You: ""You wanted to console her.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You wanted to console her."

fields.Title: You: ""You wanted to manipulate her.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You wanted to manipulate her."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Woman..." he smiles suddenly."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Woman..." he smiles suddenly.

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "And the fact that she was a *spook*..."
fields.Dialogue Text: And the fact that she was a *spook*. How did he come to that?

fields.Title: You: "The dream..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The dream...

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Yes," he nods enthusiastically. "O..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes," he nods enthusiastically. "Old-fashioned."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Khm," the lieutenant coughs."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Khm," the lieutenant coughs.

fields.Title: Cuno: ""We can totally get more out of him..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We can totally get more out of him..." the kid whispers. "He's squeelin'..."
